{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Compliance Officer (Data Protection)",
  "description": "Femban Consulting is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Compliance Officer (Data Protection)
Job Location:&nbsp;Kado, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Monitor and ensure clients&#39; compliance with data protection laws and guidelines.
	Develop and deliver training on data protection and compliance to clients
	Advise clients on data handling
	Regularly assess data processing activities, conduct audits, and monitor adherence to data protection laws.
	Identify, assess, and mitigate risks related to data breaches and non-compliance.
	Acquiring &amp; maintaining relationship with clients.
	?Develop &amp; deliver training on data protection to client


Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in IT/data protection related courses
	Experience working as a data protection officer
	Strong understanding of data protection laws
	Experience in cybersecurity, auditing, and risk management
	CDPO/CIPP/E certification is an added advantage.
	Proficient use of modern database and information system technologies and Microsoft office suites.


Salary
N300,000 - N400,000 Monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;fembanconsulting@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Compliance Officer (Data Protection) Job at Femban Consulting




        
    

        
        Femban Consulting is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Compliance Officer (Data Protection)
Job Location: Kado, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Monitor and ensure clients' compliance with data protection laws and guidelines.
	Develop and deliver training on data protection and compliance to clients
	Advise clients on data handling
	Regularly assess data processing activities, conduct audits, and monitor adherence to data protection laws.
	Identify, assess, and mitigate risks related to data breaches and non-compliance.
	Acquiring & maintaining relationship with clients.
	?Develop & deliver training on data protection to client


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in IT/data protection related courses
	Experience working as a data protection officer
	Strong understanding of data protection laws
	Experience in cybersecurity, auditing, and risk management
	CDPO/CIPP/E certification is an added advantage.
	Proficient use of modern database and information system technologies and Microsoft office suites.


Salary
N300,000 - N400,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: fembanconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Site Engineer",
  "description": "De Talents is currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Site Engineer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Collaborate with management to align activities with desired business outcomes
	Any other responsibility that may be assigned by your line manager.
	Organizing materials and ensuring sites are safe and clean.
	Preparing cost estimates and ensuringappropriate materialsand tools are available.
	Providing technical advice and suggestions for improvement onparticular projects.
	Diagnosing and troubleshooting equipment asrequired.
	Authorizing technical drawings and engineering plans.
	Drawing up work schedules and communicating any adjustments to crew members and clients.
	Gathering data, compilingreportsand delivering presentations to relevant stakeholders.
	Delegating tasks and scheduling meetings and training sessions whererequired.
	Completing quality assurance and providing feedback to the team.
	Compile and present reports explaining project details to non-technical stakeholders
	Monitor project progress, compliance with design specifications and safety standards
	Direct engineering activities; assign tasks, provide training and support
	Create work schedules and adjust as needed to meet project deadlines
	Maintain detailed documentation of all site engineering activities


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Civil or Structural Engineering, Construction, Building, or a related field
	Minimum 4 - 7 years of experience in either an engineering consultancy or engineering construction environment.
	Engineering license Is an added advantage
	Proficient in the use of computer aided design (CAD) software
	Considerable experience in similar position


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;dreamjobprof@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	Please note that the dates of each of your work experience should include the start month and year and stop month and year.E.g.July 2019 &ndash; Aug 2019.
	Only selected candidates will be contacted.

Site Engineer Job at De Talents




        
    

        
        De Talents is currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Site Engineer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Collaborate with management to align activities with desired business outcomes
	Any other responsibility that may be assigned by your line manager.
	Organizing materials and ensuring sites are safe and clean.
	Preparing cost estimates and ensuringappropriate materialsand tools are available.
	Providing technical advice and suggestions for improvement onparticular projects.
	Diagnosing and troubleshooting equipment asrequired.
	Authorizing technical drawings and engineering plans.
	Drawing up work schedules and communicating any adjustments to crew members and clients.
	Gathering data, compilingreportsand delivering presentations to relevant stakeholders.
	Delegating tasks and scheduling meetings and training sessions whererequired.
	Completing quality assurance and providing feedback to the team.
	Compile and present reports explaining project details to non-technical stakeholders
	Monitor project progress, compliance with design specifications and safety standards
	Direct engineering activities; assign tasks, provide training and support
	Create work schedules and adjust as needed to meet project deadlines
	Maintain detailed documentation of all site engineering activities


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Civil or Structural Engineering, Construction, Building, or a related field
	Minimum 4 - 7 years of experience in either an engineering consultancy or engineering construction environment.
	Engineering license Is an added advantage
	Proficient in the use of computer aided design (CAD) software
	Considerable experience in similar position


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: dreamjobprof@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	Please note that the dates of each of your work experience should include the start month and year and stop month and year.E.g.July 2019 – Aug 2019.
	Only selected candidates will be contacted.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administration Officer - Shippings & Operation",
  "description": "De Talents is currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administration Officer - Shippings &amp; Operation
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	To provide Operations / administrative support.
	To provide port operations support and secure relevant clearances from Governments agencies for vessel calls and cargo operations
	To provide customs and cargoclerancesupport and secure relevant clearances from Governments agencies for cargo operations
	Devising andmaintainingoffice systems, including data management and filing.
	Arranging travel,visasand accommodation and, occasionally, travelling with the manager to take notes or dictation at meetings or to provide generalassistanceduring presentations.
	Sporadic liaison and contact with the Government agencies.
	Data management of the various government agencies
	Screening phone calls, enquiries and requests, and handling whenappropriate.
	Drafting of mail,letterand all correspondences between the FZEs.
	Keeping proper records of all related communications and actions relating to the Free Zone management company and Government agencies.
	Keeping proper records of all immigration facilities andupdatein various expatriatefile.
	Keeping proper records of all Customs and cargo delivery activities in the Zone and make necessary updates in the relevant files.


Education and Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business Administrationor other relevant Degree
	NYSC Certificate or exemption letter.


Experience:


	Approximately 3 years of within Administrative management with a fast-paced organization
	Experience of a demanding business environment delivering successful support services
	Experience ofdealing withdifficult situationsin a diplomatic and professional manner.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;dreamjobprof@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	Please note that the dates of each of your work experience should include the start month and year and stop month and year.E.g.July 2019 &ndash; Aug 2019.
	Only selected candidates will be contacted.

  }
}



Administration Officer - Shippings & Operation Job at De Talents




        
    

        
        De Talents is currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administration Officer - Shippings & Operation
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	To provide Operations / administrative support.
	To provide port operations support and secure relevant clearances from Governments agencies for vessel calls and cargo operations
	To provide customs and cargoclerancesupport and secure relevant clearances from Governments agencies for cargo operations
	Devising andmaintainingoffice systems, including data management and filing.
	Arranging travel,visasand accommodation and, occasionally, travelling with the manager to take notes or dictation at meetings or to provide generalassistanceduring presentations.
	Sporadic liaison and contact with the Government agencies.
	Data management of the various government agencies
	Screening phone calls, enquiries and requests, and handling whenappropriate.
	Drafting of mail,letterand all correspondences between the FZEs.
	Keeping proper records of all related communications and actions relating to the Free Zone management company and Government agencies.
	Keeping proper records of all immigration facilities andupdatein various expatriatefile.
	Keeping proper records of all Customs and cargo delivery activities in the Zone and make necessary updates in the relevant files.


Education and Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administrationor other relevant Degree
	NYSC Certificate or exemption letter.


Experience:


	Approximately 3 years of within Administrative management with a fast-paced organization
	Experience of a demanding business environment delivering successful support services
	Experience ofdealing withdifficult situationsin a diplomatic and professional manner.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: dreamjobprof@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	Please note that the dates of each of your work experience should include the start month and year and stop month and year.E.g.July 2019 – Aug 2019.
	Only selected candidates will be contacted.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

Personal Assistant Job at Tecclight Systems Limited




        
    

        
        Tecclight Systems Limited is a firm poised to delivering top notch professional services from our different Conglomerates; Tecclight Systems, HR-Light Consult and Tecclight Homes.

We deliver Services Ranging from Smart Home Automation with custom grass root designs and development; Human Resource needs from Recruitment, KPI Appraisals, Employee Labor Law Relations and Compliance, HR Information and Payroll Management and Training and Development with Certifications issued recognized Internationally and Nationally; Real Estate needs ranging from Property Rentals, Sales, Property Management and Consulting, Property Construction & Development.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Personal Assistant
Job Location: Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Qualification: SSCE/OND/HND/BSc
	Candidate is expected to perform tasks based on Instructions.
	Candidate is expected to be self driven, self motivated, proactive.
	Sex: Male/Female
	Age: 22 to 26yrs.
	Location: Proximity to Abraham Adesanya Ajah Added advantage (Temporary accomodation may be possible)
	Experience: Not Neccessary (Kmowledge in Real Estate, Recruitment and Similar role added advantage).


Salary
N70,000 - N80,000 per month.

Method of Application
